abstract: The X5 Retail Group, parent of Russia’s leading retailer, bought Kopeika, and planned to merge the two in a pre-emptive strike against Wal-Mart.
snippet: The X5 Retail Group, parent of Russia’s leading retailer, bought Kopeika, and planned to merge the two in a pre-emptive strike against Wal-Mart.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW  Two of Russia’s largest grocery store chains, Pyaterochka and Kopeika, said on Monday that they would merge their operations in a move that would better position them to compete with Wal-Mart, which is expected to enter the Russian market.

headline.main: Two Russian Grocers Move to Thwart Wal-Mart
headline.print_headline: Two Russian Grocers Move to Thwart Wal-Mart
